mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (reviewNo, uuid, beerNo, reviewContent, reviewPic, rating, regDate, likeCnt) VALUES(#{reviewNo}, #{uuid}, #{beerNo}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewPic}, #{rating}, sysdate, 0)
INSERT INTO hashtag (tagNo, tagName, reviewNo, beerNo) VALUES(seq_tag_no.nextVal, #{tagName}, #{reviewNo}, #{beerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tagName FROM hashtag WHERE UPPER(tagName) Like UPPER('%' || #{keyword} || '%')
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT tagName, count(*) cnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM hashtag WHERE beerNo = #{beerNo}) GROUP BY tagName ORDER BY cnt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT * FROM review WHERE uuid = #{uuid} ORDER BY regdate DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT reviewNo, review.uuid, beerNo, reviewContent, reviewPic, rating, regDate, likeCnt, nickname, userPic FROM review, users WHERE review.uuid = users.uuid ) WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND beerNo = #{beerNo}
